content:
The lutrinal bounds forward a dozen paces, then stops and looks back at you quizzically, waiting for you to continue to "chase" it toward the surface.

A) We can't abandon it now. Discard all   from the Lost Lutrinal. Get the lutrinal to a location on the surface with a water feature in play and clear it with   to release it.

B) We'll find you again, little friend. Discard the Lost Lutrinal. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
